title: Constant lags after the new patch. Rito pls BibleThump
body:
My friend and I have been experiencing constant lags and freezes since the start of a new patch.
Freezes happen before 5 min of games. Screan freezes for a sec. Maybe it is not a serious thing, but still annoying. Other players had this problem as well.
And today our ping is high. My friend dcs almost every game when the login screen is up. He is able to log in later though.  It had never happened before the new patch and his pc is working correctly.

So I want to ask: do you experience the same issues? Are we just so unlucky?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
